circumstances:
Shortly after take off from Gioia del Colle AFB, while climbing, the aircraft went out of control and crashed in flames 2 km southwest of Mottola. All ten occupants were killed. 
Crew:
Norman E. Apking, 
Robert T. Leslie, 
Murray Hershkowitz,
James E. Gibbs, 
Forrest F. Shorey, 
Harry K. Chamberlain, 
Clayton J. Lund, 
Earl B. Hubert, 
John P. Horrigan, 
Lyle H. Ervin.
